item.title: Videographer - Upwork
item.description:
I need to hire a videographer for a conference Monday 6/24 or Tuesday 6/25 in the morning. I am going to a investment conference in San Diego and need someone to video some content for my business, in particular two presentations.

Hourly Range: $72.00-$200.00
Posted On: June 21, 2024 21:45 UTC
Category: Videography
Skills:Business, Videography, Video Production, Video Editing, Camera
Skills: Business, Videography, Video Production, Video Editing, Camera
Location Requirement: Only freelancers located in the United States may apply.
Country: United States
click to apply
